titleStmt.title: Thrēnōdia. Siue Pandionium melos, in perpetuam serenissimæ simul ac beatissimæ Principis Annæ nuper Angliæ Reginæ memoriam Elegies and epitaphs, by W.S. late seruant and chaplaine to her Maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Slatyer, William, 1587-1647.

notesStmt.note: W.S. = William Slatyer, whose name appears in anagrams on B1r and elsewhere.
In verse, mostly English, partly Hebrew, Greek, and Latin.
First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded and show-through and some pages stained.
